CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status_do_Contrato__c, "CONCLUÍDO"),IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.site.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0155A000009yAJ7&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1541071584000", "",15,15),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status_do_Contrato__c, "CANCELADO"),IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.site.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0153100000815of&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1474642970000", "",15,15),
IF(AND(Data_de_T_rmino_do_Contrato_2__c > TODAY() +30,ISPICKVAL(Status_do_Contrato__c,"CONTRATO VIGENTE")), IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.site.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0153100000815oV&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1476125905000","",15,15),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status_do_Contrato__c,"AGUARDANDO ACEITAÇÃO DA PROPOSTA"),IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.site.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0155A000009yAwk&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1541590907000", "",15,15),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status_do_Contrato__c,"ELABORAÇÃO DA PROPOSTA"),IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.site.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0155A000009yAwu&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1541591387000","",15,15),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status_do_Contrato__c,"ELABORAÇÃO DO CONTRATO"),IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.site.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0155A000009yMJZ&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1550257601000","",15,15),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status_do_Contrato__c,"CONCLUÍDO (COM PENDENCIAS)"),IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.site.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0155A000009kBi4&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1567688747000","",15,15),
IMAGE("https://hospcom.my.site.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0153100000815oa&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1474642985000","",15,15)
)))))))
CustomField.label: Status
